= Install =

In this moment Elx  is not available in the Maven's repositories so you would must download the jars from [http://code.google.com/p/orm-elx/downloads/list here]. To start to work, you must download this package:
  * Elx-commons
  * Elx-connector	
  * Elx-validation
  * Elx-orm

In the last point,  you must download de connector associated to the vendor of the DB 

|| Vendor || Connector || 
|| [http://www.postgresql.org/ PostgreSQL] ||  Elx-connector-postgreSQL || 
|| [http://www.mysql.com/ MySQL] ||   Elx-connector-mySQL || 
|| [http://db.apache.org/derby/ Apache Derby] ||   Elx-connector-derby  ||
||


 Elx-orm
 Elx-connector-postgreSQL
 Elx-connector-mySQL	 
 Elx-connector-derby
